What are you doing? Paul, what are you doing?
Don't make me...

- What the fuck are you doing? - That way back when in the alleyway,

translation.en: A love that I always had and will never know again.

translation.en: Sorry, Lisa.
You're alright.
You're fine.
I didn't even want to come to this wedding.

translation.en: Excuse me. Excuse me. Excuse me. Excuse me. Excuse me.

translation.en: Alright, make it quick, Paul.
I'll allow it.
If you're the type of guy that steals other people's murders

are some kind of fucking...du-- dumbass.

He could have said the perfect thing and he blew it.

Honey.

if something is said that's mean enough,

I've been dating you since the seventh grade.

Paul's been dating me since the sixth grade.

translation.en: I mean, not actively. We just had a moment.

Tell 'em. Tell 'em. Tell 'em.

In sixth grade?

We did it nasty style.

and then fucked on the dirty little...
sofas at the peep shows. I don't want to know anymore.

- Just do it. - There's...
Just do it. Look him in the eyes and choose.

I love you.

And I love you.
And I know he thinks he knows what love is, but I...

I saved your life.

Choose.

Choose.

Choose.

Choose.
Choose.

you could actually prove that you did that?
That you were really saved…
or is this just another figment of your imagination? You were so creative as a sixth grader.

You!

You!

translation.en: This will be an easy steal.
Or, so I thought.
I snatch your pearls, they go all over the place.

You did nothing.
But you, Paul?

You look fantastic. But, Paul?

Say it again.
I can't hear you. Say it again.
Speak up!

Take the microphone.
Tell everyone.

So, you see...
it was an accident.

So, you're telling me...
that the gun just went in the air and... it shot accidentally,

Thanks.

that was sixth grade.

you want to do your routine?

my second- born has something to say.

Dave?

translation.en: I love you.
